from notebookutils import mssparkutils

# Builds LPA FACT
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_planning_authority_fact') 
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_planning_authority_dim') 

# Builds DIMs dependant on LPA fact
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_all_appeals_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_lpa_resposability_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_picaso_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_high_hedges_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_plans_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_hedgerow_dim')

# Builds Event
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_event_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_event_fact')

# Builds DIMs for the Case_fact
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_redactions_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_case_officer_additional_details_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_common_land_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_contact_information_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_contacts_organisation_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_decision_issue_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_plans_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_advice_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_examination_timetable_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_relevant_representation_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_inspector_cases_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_case_info_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_case_dates_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_advert_details_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_enforcement_grounds_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_all_application_sub_type_case_name_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_special_circumstance_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_additional_fields_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialism_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_case_dates_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_case_string_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_coastal_access_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_environment_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_high_court_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_modifications_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_purchase_notice_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_recharge_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_tpo_dim')

# Builds case_fact
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_case_fact')
